entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
